hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion:
Your submission will be judged on 4 categories.

Creativity - How unique is your solution?

Intelligence - How well is your program able to reason?

Complexity - How technically challenging is the solution?

Impact - What value does your solution deliver?

hackathon-location-address: 800 W Campbell Rd, Richardson, TX 75080, USA
hackathon-description-header: Build an automated reasoning application using answer set programming with UT Dallas' own s(ASP) system.
